sn4.16:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava pancannam upadanakkhandhanam upadaya bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
sn4.16:1.3: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn4.16:2.2: “ayam kho samano gotamo pancannam upadanakkhandhanam upadaya bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
sn4.16:2.3: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn4.16:2.4: Yannunaham yena samano gotamo tenupasankameyyam vicakkhukammaya”ti.
sn4.16:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula patta abbhokase nikkhitta honti.
sn4.16:3.2: Atha kho maro papima balibaddavannam abhinimminitva yena te patta tenupasankami.
sn4.16:3.3: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu annataram bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn4.16:3.5: Evam vutte, bhagava tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn4.16:3.7: Maro eso papima tumhakam vicakkhukammaya agato”ti.
sn4.16:3.8: Atha kho bhagava “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
